CustomField.description: Check this box if you wish to pay TrueCost based on $5 a month per active contract each month (maximum of 18 months or $90).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if you wish to pay TrueCost based on $5 a month per active contract each month (maximum of 18 months or $90).
CustomField.label: Residual Billing for Residential Orders
